title: Sony Announces Its EV Car ‘Afeela’ at Ces
description: Move over, Tesla: Sony is teaming with Honda to enter the electric car market.
content:
Sony started its big CES 2023 event by announcing that its hit racing game Gran Turismo was coming to its new Playstation VR2 platform. And then Sony followed it up by announcing an actual car.
